abstract: Commodity prices plummeted and the Dow Jones industrials slid back nearly 300 points, a day after an interest rate cut fueled the best stock session in five years.
snippet: Commodity prices plummeted and the Dow Jones industrials slid back nearly 300 points, a day after an interest rate cut fueled the best stock session in five years.
lead_paragraph: In a sign of continuing unease in the financial markets, commodity prices plummeted and the Dow Jones industrials slid back nearly 300 points on Wednesday, a day after an interest rate cut fueled the best stock session in five years.

headline.main: A Day After a Big Rally, a Big Pullback
headline.print_headline: A Day After a Big Rally, a Big Pullback

abstract: A wave of upbeat economic news helped reverse a recent investment trend on Thursday, as commodity prices plummeted and the Dow gained 261 points.
snippet: A wave of upbeat economic news helped reverse a recent investment trend on Thursday, as commodity prices plummeted and the Dow gained 261 points.
lead_paragraph: For months, wary investors bet their fortunes on the metals and raw materials that make up the commodities market, pushing prices for oil and gold into record territory even as stocks languished.

headline.main: Stocks Bounce Back as Oil and Gold Fall Again
